snippet: Aside from his 45 points, the Knicks’ Carmelo Anthony demonstrated a calm composure in the final minutes and showed why he is, arguably, the best scorer in the N.B.A.
abstract: New York Knicks forward Carmelo Anthony's calm composure in final minutes of team's dramatic victory over Brooklyn Nets shows why is, arguably, the best scorer in the NBA.
lead_paragraph: Aside from his 45 points, the Knicks’ Carmelo Anthony demonstrated a calm composure in the final minutes and showed why he is, arguably, the best scorer in the N.B.A.

headline.seo: Carmelo Anthony Shows Patience on Scoring Run
headline.main: Shooting Star Picks Right Time to Pass
headline.print_headline: Shooting Star Picks Right Time to Pass
